actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide women veterans maternity care in Veterans' Administration facilities, to extend job counseling services to certain survivors and dependents of veterans, to liberalize widows' pensions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Entitles women veterans to maternity care in Veterans' Administration facilities. Extends job counseling services to qualified survivors and dependents of veterans. Increases the amount of entitlement for a widows' pension.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide women veterans maternity care in Veterans' Administration facilities, to extend job counseling services to certain survivors and dependents of veterans, to liberalize widows' pensions, and for other purposes.
